name: Miko (PrismGod)
description:
a cat going to adventure from the cave

Controls :
left right : move or climb
up : jump
Q W E D F R : cast spells (when they are not in cooldown)
Space : change character ( coming soon )

trivia :
Miko lives in the cave to avoid society shenanigans such as taxes
Miko doesn't need to eat sleep or breath
